title: Pro Athlete Cosmic Queries
description:
Neil deGrasse Tyson, alongside co-hosts Gary O’Reilly and Chuck Nice, answer Cosmic Queries from professional athletes including Olympic skier Lindsey Vonn, rugby player Nicole Heavirland, skateboarder Joey Brezinski, and boxer Cam F. Awesome.

NOTE: StarTalk+ Patrons and All-Access subscribers can watch or listen to this entire episode commercial-free here.

Photo Credit: U.S. Ski Team / CC BY (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/2.0)

Special thanks to Uninterrupted.
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
